text:
Hi
I am trying to run Hyperledger docker image on Mac as well as Windows 
On both , I am getting an error when I try to deploy a chaincode through CLI 
On Mac : I getting error below "dial unix /var/run/docker/sock no such file or directory"  
On Windows : I am getting an error as : "malformed HTTP response "\x15\x03\x01\x00\x02\x02\x16""
Can someone please help out here

<@U2ALHGKK4> the peer needs to have access to create/run docker containers itself, as this is what the chaincode instances will execute under....as such, you need to either a) share the /var/run/docker.sock with the peer container with a volume mount (e.g. -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock), or to b) point the peer to a network accessible instance via the CORE_VM_ENDPOINT environment variable
(CORE_VM_ENDPOINT defaults to /var/run/docker.sock, which is why you are seeing that error
